name: purpureal shawl
notes:
**size**
one size

**measurements**
width: 178 cm / 70"
depth: 80 cm / 31"

**materials**
8 skeins of seashell color 08

crochet hook 3.5 mm / us e/4

**yarn quality**
seashell, hobbii
40% cotton, 35% viscose, 25% linen
50 g (1.75 oz) = 150 m (164 yds)

**gauge**
after the setup rows and one pattern repeat, your work measures approx. 16 cm / 6.5" in width and 9 cm / 3.5" in depth.

**pattern information**
the purpureal shawl is worked from the top down, starting at the center and increasing outwards. the main pattern is an easy-to-memorize two-row repeat. it consists mostly of treble crochets and chain spaces, creating an interesting fabric that is both open and lacey, as well as textured and three-dimensional. a delicate, lace border is added last to decorate the edge of the shawl.
